text: The 2025–26 ABB FIA Formula E World Championship is the twelfth season of the FIA Formula E championship, a motor racing championship for electrically powered vehicles recognised by motorsport's governing body, the Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile (FIA), as the highest class of competition for electric open-wheel racing cars. == Teams and drivers == All teams use the Formula E Gen3 Evo car on Hankook tyres. title: 2025–26 Formula E World Championship
